note.p: Plumber and poultry breeder. Of Bristol. Specialised in Spanish fowl.
Census returns of England and Wales 1871 (The National Archives: Public Record Office RG10/2548/48/12)
England & Wales, national probate calendar (index of wills and administrations), 1858–1966, 1973–95 (Ancestry.com, accessed 1 May 2018)
Journal of Horticulture and Cottage Gardener, 24 December 1861, p. 264; 1 December 1870, p. 441
